    public class Explosion
extends Entity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Explosion(int x, int y, int w, int h, int s, int d, java.lang.String n)
      This constructor creates an Explosion at a given location, with a specific given height and width, and names the Explosion object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Explosion

        public Explosion(int x,
         int y,
         int w,
         int h,
         int s,
         int d,
         java.lang.String n)
        This constructor creates an Explosion at a given location, with a specific given height and width, and names the Explosion object. It also adds the sprites of the Explosion into an animation and saves the time the Explosion was created at.
        Parameters:
        x - - x-coordinate of the Explosion
        y - - y-coordinate of the Explosion
        w - - width of the Explosion
        h - - height of the Explosion
        s - - the size of the Explosion
        n - - name of the Explosion

    • Method Detail

      • explode

        public boolean explode(int size)
        This method manages the animation of the Explosion. Depending on the computer's time, the Explosion will have a different sprite.
        Parameters:
        size - - the size of the Explosion or stage that the Explosion is in the animating process.
        Returns:
        true if the explosion still exists or false if it should be removed because the animation is complete

      • explosion

        public int explosion()
        This method calculates and returns the value any one explosion attack will do.
        Returns:
        the value an explosion attack will do

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int s)
        This method sets the size of the Explosion.
        Parameters:
        s - - the size of the Explosion

      • setDamage

        public void setDamage(int d)
        This method sets the damage of the Explosion.
        Parameters:
        d - - the damage of the Explosion

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        This method returns the size of the Explosion.
        Returns:
        the size of the Explosion

      • getDamage

        public int getDamage()
        This method returns the damage of the Explosion.
        Returns:
        the size of the Explosion
